OM_Shadowheart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart is angry at the player for not being taken with to the Shar Temple or was denied the ability to make a choice. She tells the player she can no longer trust them and will make their own path.
OM_Shadowheart_COM.how_to_trigger: 1. Clear the Shar Temple without Shadowheart2. Leave through the portal

OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.text: You finally showed yourself - I thought you might try and avoid me.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_1.context: NodeContext: Coldly angry. Player blocked her big moment in the Shar temple (intentionally or not) and now she's cutting ties and leaving for good.

OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.text: I had a choice to make, in the heart of Lady Shar's domain. But you denied me that chance. Now my future is gone - nothing but windblown ashes and wasted potential.
OM_Shadowheart_COM_6.context: NodeContext: Coldly angry. Player blocked her big moment in the Shar temple (intentionally or not) and now she's cutting ties and leaving for good.
